Name: Name Change, Virginia Principe Playground, Queens
Title: A Local Law in relation to a playground name, Virginia Principe Playground, Borough of Queens.
BodyName: Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations

History.BodyName: Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations
Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:


      Section 1.  The following playground name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.


	New name			Present name			Limits


Virginia Principe			(None)				an existing playground 
Playground								located at the northeast
									corner of Maurice Park, 
									located at Maurice Avenue,
									54th Avenue, 63rd Street and
									Long Island Expressway
									Service Road.
      
      ï¿½2.  This local law shall take effect immediately.
